meanings.definition: To write over something already written.
meanings.sent1: She overwrites the wrong answer with the correct one.
meanings.sent2: He always overwrites his notes to make them neater.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally overwrites the important information with doodles.
meanings.sent4: His determination overwrites any doubts in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rain overwrites the footprints on the path.

meanings.sent1: They carefully overwrite the old data with new information.
meanings.sent2: The editor overwrites the original text to make improvements.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully overwrites the child's drawing with its paw prints.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter overwrites the silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist overwrites the first draft with bold strokes of color.

meanings.sent1: The software automatically overwrites the existing file with the updated version.
meanings.sent2: He overwrites the message on the board with a new announcement.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel overwrites the bird's song with its chattering.
meanings.sent4: His kindness overwrites any past mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The sunset overwrites the sky with vibrant hues.
